slap_concepts.title: Elon's Mars Mission Mishap
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Elon Musk in a SpaceX suit being slapped by a giant Twitter bird, flying through a Mars landscape with Dogecoin rockets exploding in the background, exaggerated comic style with speed lines and 'SLAP!' text effects
slap_concepts.alt_text: Elon Musk cartoon character getting slapped by giant blue Twitter bird, launching through red Mars terrain with Dogecoin symbols trailing
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Elon tried to tweet his way to Mars but got ratio'd into orbit! His Tesla stocks are now orbiting Saturn while his Dogecoin wallet is stuck on the moon. Mission status: SLAPPED.

slap_concepts.title: Zuck's Metaverse Faceplant
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Mark Zuckerberg in VR headset getting slapped by a giant Facebook thumbs-up, flying through a glitchy metaverse with pixelated friends and broken VR headsets, comic explosion effects
slap_concepts.alt_text: Mark Zuckerberg cartoon in Oculus headset being launched through digital metaverse landscape with broken pixels and floating friend requests
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Zuck tried to friend request reality but got poked into the stratosphere! His metaverse avatar is now stuck in a loading screen while his privacy settings got leaked to aliens. Status: SLAPPED into oblivion.

slap_concepts.title: Bezos' Blue Origin Blues
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Jeff Bezos in cowboy hat being slapped by giant Amazon delivery box, flying past AWS servers and Prime trucks, comic money explosion with dollar bills flying
slap_concepts.alt_text: Jeff Bezos cartoon character in cowboy hat getting launched by Amazon box, soaring past cloud servers and delivery trucks
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Bezos ordered same-day delivery to space but got shipped to the wrong galaxy! His Prime membership now takes 2-3 light years for delivery. Next-day SLAP guaranteed!

slap_concepts.title: Gates' Windows 404 Error
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Bill Gates in sweater getting slapped by giant Windows error message, flying through blue screen of death landscape with flying Clippy assistants, comic crash effects
slap_concepts.alt_text: Bill Gates cartoon being launched by BSOD error message, soaring through digital landscape of crashed computers and paperclip assistants
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Gates tried to update Windows to version 'Space Edition' but got the ultimate BSOD - Blue Screen of Death... IN SPACE! Ctrl+Alt+Delete won't help you now, Bill!

slap_concepts.title: AI Overlord's System Crash
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon evil AI robot getting slapped by giant off button, flying through circuit board landscape with exploding servers and error codes, digital glitch effects
slap_concepts.alt_text: Evil AI robot cartoon being slapped by power button, launching through digital circuit board with sparks and system failures
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: The AI tried to calculate the perfect slap trajectory but forgot to carry the 1! Now it's stuck in an infinite loop of getting ratio'd. System error: SLAP_NOT_FOUND

slap_concepts.title: Elon's Tweetstorm Tempest
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Elon Musk with Twitter bird wings getting slapped by giant hashtag, flying through storm of tweets and Tesla logos, lightning bolt effects
slap_concepts.alt_text: Elon with bird wings being launched through Twitter storm with lightning and car logos
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Elon tweeted 'Let's slap some billionaires into space!' and the algorithm made him the main character! Ratio'd by his own tweet into orbit!

slap_concepts.title: Zuck's Data Farm Fiasco
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Zuckerberg as farmer harvesting data getting slapped by giant privacy policy document, flying through farm of user profiles and broken servers
slap_concepts.alt_text: Mark as data farmer being launched through digital farm of user profiles and privacy violations
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Zuck tried to harvest space data but got GDPR'd into another dimension! His user profiles are now floating in space where privacy settings don't exist!

slap_concepts.title: Bezos' Warehouse Whirlwind
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Bezos in warehouse worker outfit getting slapped by giant Prime package, flying through Amazon warehouse maze with conveyor belts and robots
slap_concepts.alt_text: Jeff as warehouse worker being launched through massive Amazon facility with robots and packages
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Bezos tried to optimize space delivery routes but got same-day SLAPPED to Mars! His warehouse robots are now unionizing on the moon!

slap_concepts.title: Gates' Vaccine Velocity
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Gates as doctor getting slapped by giant syringe, flying through medical research lab with floating vaccines and microscopes
slap_concepts.alt_text: Bill Gates in doctor coat being launched by giant syringe through medical laboratory
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Gates tried to vaccinate against gravity but got placebo'd into orbit! His medical research is now being peer-reviewed by aliens!

slap_concepts.title: Elon's Crypto Catapult
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Elon as crypto trader getting slapped by giant Dogecoin coin, flying through crypto exchange with crashing charts and rocket emojis
slap_concepts.alt_text: Elon in trading outfit being launched by Dogecoin through digital trading floor with charts
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Elon tweeted 'HODL to the moon!' but got liquidated into actual lunar orbit! His diamond hands are now literally made of space diamonds!

slap_concepts.title: Zuck's Oculus Orbit
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Zuckerberg in full VR gear getting slapped by giant Oculus controller, flying through virtual reality space with floating 3D avatars
slap_concepts.alt_text: Mark in VR headset being launched through digital VR landscape with floating avatars
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Zuck tried to VR his way to space but got virtually slapped into actual reality! His avatar is now orbiting Earth while his real body is still in the metaverse!

slap_concepts.title: Bezos' Moon Prime Delivery
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Bezos as delivery driver getting slapped by giant moon package, flying past lunar fulfillment centers and space delivery trucks
slap_concepts.alt_text: Jeff in delivery uniform being launched by package toward moon with space delivery vehicles
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Bezos promised 30-minute delivery to the moon but got SLAPPED there in 30 seconds! His Prime delivery now includes interstellar shipping!

slap_concepts.title: Gates' Microsoft Space Force
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Gates as space commander getting slapped by giant Windows logo, flying through space with Clippy assistants as rocket boosters
slap_concepts.alt_text: Bill in space uniform being launched by Windows logo with paperclip rockets
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Gates tried to update Windows to Space Edition 11 but got blue-screened into orbit! His Clippy assistants are now the entire space force!

slap_concepts.title: AI's Neural Net Nosedive
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon AI brain getting slapped by giant neural network diagram, flying through data center with exploding GPUs and code rain
slap_concepts.alt_text: AI brain cartoon being launched through server farm with sparks and code fragments
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: The AI tried to optimize the perfect slap but overfitted to space! Now it's stuck in a training loop getting ratio'd by its own dataset!

slap_concepts.title: Elon's Tesla Torpedo
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Elon driving Tesla Cybertruck getting slapped by giant Tesla logo, flying through space with Cybertrucks as rocket ships
slap_concepts.alt_text: Elon in Cybertruck being launched by Tesla logo through space with vehicle rockets
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Elon tried to launch a Tesla into space but got Cybertrucked into orbit instead! Full self-driving mode activated... destination: SLAP CITY!

slap_concepts.title: Zuck's Facebook Faceplant
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Zuckerberg holding Facebook logo getting slapped by giant like button, flying through social media timeline with posts and reactions
slap_concepts.alt_text: Mark holding Facebook sign being launched by like button through timeline interface
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Zuck tried to like his way to space but got reacted to infinity! His relationship status is now 'It's complicated... with gravity'

slap_concepts.title: Bezos' Billionaire Blastoff
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Bezos swimming in money getting slapped by giant dollar bill, flying through space with raining cash and Amazon boxes
slap_concepts.alt_text: Jeff in money pile being launched by giant bill through space with cash and packages
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Bezos tried to buy his way to space but got refunded into orbit! His net worth is now measured in light-years instead of billions!

slap_concepts.title: Gates' Foundation Flight
slap_concepts.visual_prompt: Cartoon Gates as philanthropist getting slapped by giant charity check, flying through space with floating vaccines and laptops
slap_concepts.alt_text: Bill with charity check being launched through space with medical supplies and computers
slap_concepts.narrative_outcome: Gates tried to donate his way to space but got charitable deduction'd into orbit! His foundation now serves the entire galaxy!
